OOC: I figured I would change the subject .. make it much less
confusing! 

OOC: Also if anyone wants to find us, they may do so. The minions are
trying to keep a low profile, and are acting with military tactical
stealth, but with the exception of Blackrazor, no one is using any
cloaking technology at the moment.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ yahoo.com> wrote:
> 
> From his position much nearer to the quarry a dark figure looked from
> the shadows, his shielding protecting him from the prying optic as
well
> as the errant sensor. "Prepare yourselves." his whisper silent voice
> emanated over the channels. He paused and looked around one last
time,
> passive scanners seeking anything out of the ordinary ....
>

BIC:

Nightrazor shook his head from the shadows of his sensor cloak as he
spoke across the encrypted channel, his voice whisper quiet, "There is
no one even remotely close who could have observed her capture. This
place is useless to us."

-------------------------

Deepstryke, the largest of the figures nodded at his radio, "As I
figured. Moving on to Plan B." He frowned as he looked over at the
black and red armored minion femme. "What information do we have about
the location of her capture."

Phobia took out a small PADD and looked over, "Our target's last known
location was nearly one thousand meters in that direction." The femme
points to a place a little off the river bed and much higher up.
"Sensors detected both Maximal and Predacon energy signatures." Phobia
continued to read as she checked through the last logs. "There is not
much else." 

Deepstryke looked over to where Phobia pointed, "Okay, then let's move
there and investigate. Perhaps there is some residual energy reading.
If she truly was in battle and was captured there should be something:
Bits of armor, burn marks, weapon fragments, casings, something. Let's
move out!" 

The rest nod to their leader as they all take to the air, and move to
their secondary location - the location of Blacknightmare's battle with
the Maximals and Predacons.

----------

In the distance Nightrazor watched the Valley Mine, a small smile crept
across his face. He looked down in annoyance as his radio vibrated
alerting him to the fact the team was moving to their new location. 

With a nod and Nightrazor disappeared.

Preston
(Da'minion)
